subject: TDD for servlets and multipart/form-data?
msgSnippet: Does anyone have a suggestion for how to test servlets that expect multipart/form-data?  I m trying to TDD a file submission servlet. I m looking through
messageBody:
Does anyone have a suggestion for how to test servlets that expect
multipart/form-data? I'm trying to TDD a file submission servlet.
I'm looking through httpunit/servletunit, but don't see how to create
a WebRequest that is multipart. It looks like I can create a web page
that contains a form which points to my servlet, and then submit on
that, but that seems kind of convoluted. There must be a better way.
Any pointers will be appreciated, thanks.


--
George Armhold
Rutgers University
eLearning Grant, DCIS
